name: Moss Networks
tag_list: public-relations, marketing, consulting, advertising, events, corporate-events, event-marketing, promotions, trade-shows, trade-show-coordination, media-buys, seo, business-to-business-pr, marketing-strategies, technology-pr, online-marketing
overview:
Moss Networks is a full service Marketing, Public Relations and Event Production powerhouse dedicated to providing aggressive and innovative publicity campaigns, detailed and unparalleled event planning, strategic marketing strategies, and brand positioning to a wide range of businesses. For nearly a decade, they have applied their inspired vision, original concepts, and attention to detail to develop forward-thinking event marketing and public relations initiatives. The strength of the company lies in their ability to build the value of their clients’ brands and execute their visions with innovative and focused strategies.

Moss Networks services include everything from developing, executing and managing comprehensive PR plans aimed at generating and building brand awareness to coordinating strategic media buys , tradeshow coordination and event management. In addition to these services, Moss Networks works to enhance branding and exposure for clients via social media, PR, SEO, Online Reputation management and creative services. This boutique-sized firm offers a more personal and individualized approach thus creating impactful results for their clients.
